trans-unit.source: Defines the context for a set of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 为一组 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 对象定义上下文。

trans-unit.source: `XmlDocument` objects that are created from the same implementation share the same <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: `XmlDocument` 从同一实现创建的对象共享相同<xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>。

trans-unit.source: This enables users to compare attribute and element names between the objects more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 这使用户能够更有效地比较的对象对象之间的属性和元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: Although the `XmlDocument` objects share the same implementation, to move nodes from one document to another, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 尽管`XmlDocument`对象共享相同的实现，若要将节点从一个文档移到另一个，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlImplementation" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see langword="XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see langword="XmlDocument" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: `XmlDocument` objects created from the same implementation share the same name table.
trans-unit.target: `XmlDocument` 从同一实现创建的对象共享相同的名称表。

trans-unit.source: This enables users to compare attribute and element names between the objects more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 这使用户能够更有效地比较的对象对象之间的属性和元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: Although the `XmlDocument` objects share the same implementation, to move nodes from one document to another, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 尽管`XmlDocument`对象共享相同的实现，若要将节点从一个文档移到另一个，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two `XmlDocument` objects from the same implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个`XmlDocument`从同一实现的对象。

trans-unit.source: The package name of the feature to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的功能的程序包名称。

trans-unit.source: This name is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 该名称不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: This is the version number of the package name to test.
trans-unit.target: 这是要测试的软件包名称的版本号。

trans-unit.source: If the version is not specified (<see langword="null" />), supporting any version of the feature causes the method to return <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定版本 (<see langword="null" />)，则支持该功能的任何版本会导致方法返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the Document Object Model (DOM) implementation implements a specific feature.
trans-unit.target: 测试文档对象模型 (DOM) 实现是否实现某个特定的功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the feature is implemented in the specified version; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的版本中实现了该功能，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the combinations that cause <see langword="HasFeature" /> to return <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示导致 <see langword="HasFeature" /> 返回 <see langword="true" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> strFeature
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> strFeature

trans-unit.source: </term><description> strVersion
trans-unit.target: </term><description> strVersion

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> XML
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> XML

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 1.0
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 1.0

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> XML
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> XML

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 2.0
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 2.0
